entry.em: ..ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST MONDAY

entry.data:
FREEZING RAIN
SLEET WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW THIS MORNING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AND SLEET THIS AFTERNOON
PRECIPITATION MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES THIS MORNING
SNOW AND SLEET ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
ICE ACCUMULATION OF ONE QUARTER TO ONE HALF OF AN INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

SNOW
FREEZING RAIN LIKELY WITH POSSIBLE FREEZING DRIZZLE AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
ICE ACCUMULATION OF UP TO A TENTH OF AN INCH
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 2 TO 4 INCHES POSSIBLE
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 12
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS AROUND 30
